inclusion.criterion: Suspected or certain neurally-mediated syncope, based on the Guidelines of the ESC TF on Syncope.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 3 syncope episodes in the last 2 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Severe clinical presentation of syncope requiring treatment initiation in the judgement of the investigator.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients have undergone carotid sinus massage, and ILR implantation.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: ILR not implanted for any reason; in this case, the patients are still followed in the ILR-not implanted group.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
